New Records: Lukaku set a competition record of 14 goals in a qualifying group last year
Key Match Events: Ivan Schranz scored the opening goal in the seventh minute
Two Romelu Lukaku goals were ruled out by video review
Dávid Hancko made a brave goal-line block that left him sprawled in the netting with a face injury inflicted by a teammate's knee
Loïs Openda handled the ball before his decisive pass to Lukaku for a powerful shot
Pre-Game Insights: Slovakia coach Francesco Calzona praised veterans Kucka and Peter Pekarík for their performance
Post-Match Reflections: Belgium coach Domenico Tedesco said 'I want to be at least a good, fair loser' about the match officials
Tedesco praised Lukaku as 'a top-class player, a great character'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Slovakia squad and staff danced in front of their fans in the 45,181 crowd at the Waldstadion after the win
The upset was on after an error in defense by De Bruyne's Manchester City teammate Jérémy Doku
Slovakia's victory was preserved by their energetic pressing on Belgium's makeshift defense
Others: Belgium fell to a first loss in 15 games under Tedesco
Slovakia has one day less to prepare for facing Ukraine in Duesseldorf on Friday
